abilities.description:
Once per visit, when you offload valuable goods in a community, roll +wits. On a strong hit, choose two. On a weak hit, choose one. On a miss, you make a bad deal; @Compendium[foundry-ironsworn.starforgedmoves.78baa51694fe37c5]{Pay the Price}.

  • Trade for services: Make one recovery move (not Sojourn) with an automatic strong hit
  • Trade for clout or solidarity: Mark 1 tick on your bonds legacy track
  • Trade for goods or coin: Mark 1 tick on your quests legacy track

As above, and on a match, you uncover a chance to obtain a unique (if a strong hit) or problematic (if a miss) resource or item. Envision the opportunity. If you secure it, mark 2 ticks on your quests legacy track.
When you @Compendium[foundry-ironsworn.starforgedmoves.141aec8b92efd14b]{Develop Your Relationship} with a connection through a mutually beneficial trade, mark progress twice on the relationship.
